text.text_translated: Unlike many other artists who sell many albums, Bruce Springsteen is still creating new music that reaches the top of the charts and fills large stadiums, even though he is in his late 60s. This does not surprise me because Springsteen is a man who tells us important stories about ourselves. When you listen to his album Born in the USA, these stories are still relevant today, meaning they are connected to our current lives and experiences.
